selectedVerses.text: their arrows are sharp, all their bows bent, their horses' hoofs seem like flint, and their wheels like the whirlwind.
Like emery harder than flint have I made your forehead. Fear them not, nor be dismayed at their looks, for they are a rebellious house."
who turns the rock into a pool of water, the flint into a spring of water.
So Joshua made flint knives and circumcised the sons of Israel at Gibeath-haaraloth.
At that time the LORD said to Joshua, "Make flint knives and circumcise the sons of Israel a second time."
